moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nf6: Russian game aka Petroff Defence - A drawish tools employed and popularized by Former world champion GM Kramnik during his reign. Although it look symmetrical but done be fool by it as it is lethal as any other opening which is rich on theory.
